name: Beneath the Bridge of Dream
text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When you choose a plot card to reveal in the plot phase, instead shuffle your used pile into your plot deck and choose a plot card to reveal at random. Until the end of the round, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 2.

name: Ser Gerris Drinkwater
text: Renown. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ser Gerris Drinkwater comes out of shadows, choose a card in your plot deck and switch it with a card in your used pile.

name: The Shadow City
text: Shadow (2). Reduce the cost to marshal each of your cards into shadows by 1. Challenges Action: Kneel The Shadow City and discard 1 card from shadows to draw 2 cards.

name: Nefarious Acolyte
text: Shadow (5). Action: Kneel Nefarious Acolyte and pay 1 gold to choose a plot card. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
